## What are Open Educational Resources? {.centre}

::: incremental
-   [ **any type** ]{style="color:#FFCD00"} of teaching material
-   which is [ **shared online** ]{style="color:#FFCD00"}
-   for which [ **reuse is explicitly** ]{style="color:#FFCD00"} allowed
:::

## OER at UU Library

The University Library supports teachers in sharing their open educational resources online through www.edusources.nl.
